languages.text: Джай Хейдари немедленно заявляет, что капитан Демир точно не стал бы мотаться по пустоте из "исследовательского интереса", а только ради очень хорошей наживы. Раз так, то и Лорд-капитану стоит присмотреться к пылающим мирам.

traits.locale_text: Джай Хейдари немедленно заявляет, что капитан Демир точно не стал бы мотаться по пустоте из "исследовательского интереса", а только ради очень хорошей наживы. Раз так, то и Лорд-капитану стоит присмотреться к пылающим мирам.

languages.text: Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.
languages.original_text: Джай Хейдари немедленно заявляет, что капитан Демир точно не стал бы мотаться по пустоте из "исследовательского интереса", а только ради очень хорошей наживы. Раз так, то и Лорд-капитану стоит присмотреться к пылающим мирам.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari immediately voices her strong disbelief that Captain Demir would ever dash about in the void in pursuit of "a researcher's interest," rather than a very good profit. Which suggests that the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into fireworlds.

Jae Heydari immediately voices her strong disbelief that Captain Demir would ever dash about in the void in pursuit of "a researcher's interest," rather than a very good profit. Which suggests that the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into fireworlds.

Jae Heydari immediately voices her strong disbelief that Captain Demir would ever dash about the void in pursuit of "a researcher's interest," but rather only for a very good profit. Which suggests that the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

languages.text: 婕伊·海达利立刻声明，绍恩舰长绝对不会出于“学术方面的好奇心”冲入虚空之中，他这么做肯定是为了获得相当丰厚的回报。如果是这种情况，或许舰长大人也应该去燃烧世界一探究竟。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊·海达利立刻声明，绍恩舰长绝对不会出于“学术方面的好奇心”冲入虚空之中，他这么做肯定是为了获得相当丰厚的回报。如果是这种情况，或许舰长大人也应该去燃烧群界一探究竟。

languages.text: Jae Heydari declara inmediatamente que el capitán Shahnee no recorrería el vacío por «curiosidad intelectual», pero sí por una remuneración considerable. Dicho esto, tal vez le convenga a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán investigar estos mundos ardientes.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari declara inmediatamente que el capitán Shahnee no recorrería el vacío por «curiosidad intelectual», pero sí por una remuneración considerable. Dicho esto, tal vez le convenga a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán investigar estos mundos ardientes.

languages.text: シャーニー船長は「学術的好奇心」から虚空一帯を突き進んだりはしない。それなりに高い見返りを求めているはずだと、ジェイ・ヘイダリは即断する。であれば、ロード・キャプテンも、このバーニングワールドを覗いてみてはどうだろう。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: シャーニー船長は「学術的好奇心」から虚空一帯を突き進んだりはしない。それなりに高い見返りを求めているはずだと、ジェイ・ヘイダリは即断する。であれば、ロード・キャプテンも、このバーニングワールドを覗いてみてはどうだろう。

languages.text: Jae Heydari verkündet unverzüglich, dass Captain Shahnee niemals aus "wissenschaftlicher Neugier" durch die Leere jetten würde, sondern nur für einen ausreichend hohen finanziellen Profit. Wenn dem so ist, sollte vielleicht auch der Lord Captain sich eingehender mit diesen brennenden Welten beschäftigen.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari verkündet unverzüglich, dass Captain Shahnee niemals aus "wissenschaftlicher Neugier" durch die Leere jetten würde, sondern nur für einen ausreichend hohen finanziellen Profit. Wenn dem so ist, sollte vielleicht auch der Lord Captain sich eingehender mit diesen brennenden Welten beschäftigen.

languages.text: Jae Heydari affirme immédiatement que le capitaine Shahnee ne s'aventurerait jamais dans l'espace pour un quelconque « intérêt académique », mais plutôt parce qu'il estime pouvoir en tirer des profits. Si c'est le cas, {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine pourrait bien s'intéresser {mf|lui|elle} aussi à ces mondes ardents.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari affirme immédiatement que le capitaine Shahnee ne s'aventurerait jamais dans l'espace pour un quelconque « intérêt académique », mais plutôt parce qu'il estime pouvoir en tirer des profits. Si c'est le cas, {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine pourrait bien s'intéresser {mf|lui|elle} aussi à ces mondes ardents.

languages.text: Jae Heydari, Kaptan Shahnee'nin "akademik merak" için boşlukta dolaşmayacağını, ciddi kazanç elde etmek amacıyla hareket ettiğini açıklıyor. Belki de Lord Kaptan'ın da bu yanan dünyalar konusuyla ilgilenmesi gerekiyordur.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari immediately declares that Captain Shahnee would never dash about the void out of "scholarly curiosity," but only for a suitably high return. In that case, perhaps the Lord Captain, too, might want to look into these burning worlds.
